content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #83630 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?
P-medium seems ok to me; it's invalid code and the ICE points to the right span

The one reason I might suggest a higher priority is that it's a pretty dangerous bug if we have TyKind::Error but no diagnostic reported. But it seems that having that happen will cause a compiler panic, so hopefully it shouldn't be able to cause unsoundness.

So, I think P-medium seems good to me as well :)
